# Blazingly Fast Freedom 
## Headless WordPress and GatsbyJS 

WordCamp Dayton 2019

Alex J. Gustafson 

wcdayton2019.alexjgustafson.tech

---

# Freedom

> In 2018, the mission of “Democratize Publishing” to me means that people of all backgrounds, interests, and abilities should be able to access Free-as-in-speech software that empowers them to express themselves on the open web and to own their content.
<cite>Matt Mullenweg</cite>

[Dec 26 2018: Democratize Publishing, Revisited](https://ma.tt/2018/12/democratize-publishing-revisited/)

# The Content Mesh

![The Content Mesh ](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/static/0628c2b1ba9cda8dba50deea54df20bf/51705/three-website-revolutions.png)

From ["Delivering Modern Website Experiences: The Journey to a Content Mesh"](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/blog/2018-10-04-journey-to-the-content-mesh/) by Sam Bhagwat, Gatsby Co-founder

---

# Blazingly Fast Freedom

- WordPress: Free-as-in-speech software loved by content creators 
- Modern JavaScript: Developer experience enhanced with the most modern tooling 
- Site Performance: Freedom for all visitors to have the best experience possible
